message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $145. This is a great opportunity to get a high-quality item at an excellent value.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! That product looks great, but $145 is a bit steep for me. Would you consider $110?
I appreciate your interest in our product, Bob. After considering your offer, I believe we can reach a fair agreement. I would like to propose $125 for the product.
I understand you're firm on the price, Alice. How about we meet in the middle at $117?
Thank you for your willingness to negotiate, Bob. Considering your last offer, I would like to suggest a price of $122 for the product.
